data:
Facsimile Images

[Larib(us) A]ugus[tis]
[sac]rum
L(ucius) Calp̣[urni]us Apthonetus
IIII vir Augustalis

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1989; [Genio A]ugus[ti], Libertini

English translation

Sacred to the Lares of Augustus. Lucius Calpurnius Apthonetus, IIIIvir Augustalis (dedicated it)

commentary

R. Duthoy, 'Les Augustales' in ANRW 2.16.2 (1978), p.1266 notes the oddity of IIII vir Augustalis rather than VIvir. Manganaro suggests an Augustan date, but this is not certain.

bibliography
